content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":210972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ、聖刀日光……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right, the holy sword Nikkō...\""},{"lineNumber":210973,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人の天敵だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the demon's natural enemy.\""},{"lineNumber":210974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、これで対等だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, we're equal!\""},{"lineNumber":210975,"originalJapaneseLine":"　反撃に出るぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go on the counterattack!\""},{"lineNumber":210976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーははは！　弱い弱い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha! Weak, weak!\""},{"lineNumber":210977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":210978,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やはり、魔人サテラともなると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As expected, when it comes to the demon Satella,"},{"lineNumber":210979,"originalJapaneseLine":"　新入りの魔人とは格が違うか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"she's on a different level than a rookie demon...\""},{"lineNumber":210980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日光……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nikkō...\""},{"lineNumber":210981,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう少し融通を利かせることは出来ないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can't you be a little more flexible?\""},{"lineNumber":210982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":210983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無理です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's impossible."},{"lineNumber":210984,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初から言っていましたよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"I told you from the start,"},{"lineNumber":210985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相性が悪いのに無理矢理使えばこうなると」","translatedEnglishLine":"if you force it despite bad compatibility, this will happen.\""},{"lineNumber":210986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか……仕方ないな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see... It can't be helped...\""},{"lineNumber":210987,"originalJapaneseLine":"ずっしりとした重さを感じているのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Feeling a heavy weight,"},{"lineNumber":210988,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズは改めて日光を構え直す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Arms re-gripped Nikkō."},{"lineNumber":210989,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人の戦いぶりはあまりにぎこちなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The way the two fought was terribly awkward."},{"lineNumber":210990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん！　なんだ、この程度か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph! What's this level?\""},{"lineNumber":210991,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あははは！　なら、これで終わりだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha! Then this is the end!\""},{"lineNumber":210992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh!\""},{"lineNumber":210993,"originalJapaneseLine":"鞭が伸びるように迫り、","translatedEnglishLine":"The whip stretched forward,"},{"lineNumber":210994,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズはギリギリで避けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Arms barely dodged."},{"lineNumber":210995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿め！　サテラの狙いはこちらだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool! Satella's target is here!\""},{"lineNumber":210996,"originalJapaneseLine":"アームズの手元で鞭の軌道が突如変わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"At Arms' grip, the whip's trajectory suddenly changed."},{"lineNumber":210997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":210998,"originalJapaneseLine":"火の出るような鞭の一閃。","translatedEnglishLine":"A flash of the whip, like a blast of fire."},{"lineNumber":210999,"originalJapaneseLine":"日光の刀身が綺麗に真っ二つにされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The blade of Nikkō was cleanly split in two."},{"lineNumber":211000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっはっはっはっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":211001,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頼みの日光もこれでなくなったな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've lost your relied-upon Nikkō now!\""},{"lineNumber":211002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、魔人の恐ろしさ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, the terror of the demon!"},{"lineNumber":211003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その身に刻み込め！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Carve it into your body!\""},{"lineNumber":211004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、ひーーーーッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek, eek---!"},{"lineNumber":211005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殺されるー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm going to be killed!\""},{"lineNumber":211006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つ、強ぇ……勝てねぇよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, strong... can't win...\""},{"lineNumber":211007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、弱いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, pathetic.\""},{"lineNumber":211008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここまで来るくらいだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since you've come this far,"},{"lineNumber":211009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か秘策でもあるのかと思ったら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought you had some secret strategy...\""},{"lineNumber":211010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様ら、覚悟はいいだろうな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You all, are you prepared...?\""},{"lineNumber":211011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間の分際で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As mere humans,"},{"lineNumber":211012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王様の聖域を汚した罪は万死に値する」","translatedEnglishLine":"the crime of defiling the demon lord's sanctuary deserves death a thousand times over.\""},{"lineNumber":211013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後悔して！　そして死ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Regret it! And then die!\""},{"lineNumber":211014,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが鞭を構える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella readied her whip."},{"lineNumber":211015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、待って下さいだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, please!\""},{"lineNumber":211016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだぁ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it...?\""},{"lineNumber":211017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おらだす！　ロッキーだす！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's me! Rocky!\""},{"lineNumber":211018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうかやめて下さいだ、サテラ様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please stop, Lady Satella!\""},{"lineNumber":211019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はあ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":211020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":211021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、いたなぁ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, there was someone like you..."},{"lineNumber":211022,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前みたいな奴……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone like you...\""},{"lineNumber":211023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、どうしてこんなひどいことばかり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, why do such terrible things keep happening...?"},{"lineNumber":211024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昔は人間とも仲良くしていただすのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Back then, I used to get along with humans too...\""},{"lineNumber":211025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":211026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ば、馬鹿を言うな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-don't be stupid!"},{"lineNumber":211027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誇り高き魔人であるサテラが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella, the proud demon,"},{"lineNumber":211028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうして人間なんぞと――」","translatedEnglishLine":"why would she associate with humans—\""},{"lineNumber":211029,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも、ランス様やシィルさんとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but, with Lord Rance and Shiru-san...\""},{"lineNumber":211030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、あ、か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-naka...\""},{"lineNumber":211031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、黙れ黙れ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-shut up, shut up!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、魔人サテラともなると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As expected, when it comes to the demon Satella,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新入りの魔人とは格が違うか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she's on a different level than a rookie demon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し融通を利かせることは出来ないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't you be a little more flexible?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から言っていましたよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相性が悪いのに無理矢理使えばこうなると」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you force it despite bad compatibility, this will happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっしりとした重さを感じているのか、
アームズは改めて日光を構え直す。
二人の戦いぶりはあまりにぎこちなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The way the two fought was terribly awkward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん！　なんだ、この程度か？」
「あははは！　なら、これで終わりだ！」
鞭が伸びるように迫り、
アームズはギリギリで避けた。
「馬鹿め！　サテラの狙いはこちらだ！」
アームズの手元で鞭の軌道が突如変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Arms' grip, the whip's trajectory suddenly changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火の出るような鞭の一閃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flash of the whip, like a blast of fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光の刀身が綺麗に真っ二つにされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blade of Nikkō was cleanly split in two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼みの日光もこれでなくなったな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've lost your relied-upon Nikkō now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで来るくらいだから、
何か秘策でもあるのかと思ったら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you had some secret strategy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様ら、覚悟はいいだろうな……」
魔王様の聖域を汚した罪は万死に値する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the crime of defiling the demon lord's sanctuary deserves death a thousand times over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おらだす！　ロッキーだす！
どうかやめて下さいだ、サテラ様！」
「うう、どうしてこんなひどいことばかり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, why do such terrible things keep happening...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔は人間とも仲良くしていただすのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, I used to get along with humans too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誇り高き魔人であるサテラが、
どうして人間なんぞと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: why would she associate with humans—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、ランス様やシィルさんとは……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、魔人サテラともなると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As expected, when it comes to the demon Satella,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新入りの魔人とは格が違うか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she's on a different level than a rookie demon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し融通を利かせることは出来ないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't you be a little more flexible?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から言っていましたよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相性が悪いのに無理矢理使えばこうなると」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you force it despite bad compatibility, this will happen."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっしりとした重さを感じているのか、
アームズは改めて日光を構え直す。
二人の戦いぶりはあまりにぎこちなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The way the two fought was terribly awkward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん！　なんだ、この程度か？」
「あははは！　なら、これで終わりだ！」
鞭が伸びるように迫り、
アームズはギリギリで避けた。
「馬鹿め！　サテラの狙いはこちらだ！」
アームズの手元で鞭の軌道が突如変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Arms' grip, the whip's trajectory suddenly changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火の出るような鞭の一閃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flash of the whip, like a blast of fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日光の刀身が綺麗に真っ二つにされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blade of Nikkō was cleanly split in two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼みの日光もこれでなくなったな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've lost your relied-upon Nikkō now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで来るくらいだから、
何か秘策でもあるのかと思ったら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought you had some secret strategy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様ら、覚悟はいいだろうな……」
魔王様の聖域を汚した罪は万死に値する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the crime of defiling the demon lord's sanctuary deserves death a thousand times over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おらだす！　ロッキーだす！
どうかやめて下さいだ、サテラ様！」
「うう、どうしてこんなひどいことばかり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, why do such terrible things keep happening...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔は人間とも仲良くしていただすのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then, I used to get along with humans too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誇り高き魔人であるサテラが、
どうして人間なんぞと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: why would she associate with humans—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、ランス様やシィルさんとは……」
